head.title: School Closure Update April 21 2020 - Weld RE-4 School District

img.alt: This is the image for the news article titled School Closure Update April 21 2020

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: The COVID-19 crisis has affected all of us in ways we would not have anticipated and disrupted our lives for much longer than we could have imagined. Back in March, we were hopeful that students would return to their classrooms after an extended spring break. Unfortunately, the reality is students will not be able to return this school year.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: On a conference call this morning, Governor Jared Polis shared with Colorado superintendents the state's Safer at Home precautions for May and likely June. He communicated that in-person schooling is canceled for the remainder of this school year and that the state is actively working on what school will look like in the fall. In the scenario where the virus is still with us and there is no cure or vaccine, he indicated that school may look different with safety measures and social distancing built into the fabric. He said that while he hopes and expects students will be back at school this fall, districts should be prepared to shift to remote learning if needed. Should this occur, remote learning in Weld RE-4 will continue to evolve and look different than it did this spring, prioritizing new learning and additional accountability.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: Please know, continuing remote learning is a priority for students through the last day of the 2019-20 school year (May 21). In early May, each school will communicate a plan for students to come back into the building to retrieve personal items. Pick-up procedures are aligned with social distancing protocols and will be reviewed with the Weld County Department of Public Health and Environment.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: In the final weeks of school, you can expect that our schools will continue to refine and improve their remote learning plans to support the emotional and academic success of students. This includes our graduating Windsor High School seniors as they make the transition to their next steps in life. The governor informed superintendents that traditional graduation ceremonies will likely not be possible until late fall. We will find ways to celebrate this important milestone in our students lives. Additionally, the district will continue providing meals and technology devices and support through at least the last day of school. Further guidance will be forthcoming regarding traditional summer activities.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: This is not how we envisioned ending the school year. Like many of you, we feel disappointed and saddened. However, overshadowing those feelings is an incredible sense of hope and faith. Even though we are physically distanced, I believe our sense of community has never been stronger. Under unprecedented circumstances, our teachers are finding new ways to connect and support our students and one another. Our community and our school district will never be the same we expect it will be better.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: We look forward to welcoming our students, families, and staff back to school. Stay healthy and safe.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;
font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: La crisis de COVID-19 nos ha afectado a todos de maneras que no hubiramos anticipado e interrumpido nuestras vidas durante mucho ms tiempo de lo que podramos haber imaginado. En marzo, tenamos la esperanza de que los estudiantes regresaran a sus salones de clases despus de un largo descanso de primavera. Desafortunadamente, la realidad es que los estudiantes no podrn regresar este ao escolar.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: En una conferencia telefnica esta maana, el gobernador Jared Polis comparti con los superintendentes de Colorado las precauciones ms seguras en el estado para mayo y probablemente junio. l comunic que la educacin en persona se cancela por el resto de este ao escolar y que el estado est trabajando activamente en cmo se ver la escuela en el otoo. En el escenario donde el virus todava est con nosotros y no hay cura o vacuna, indic que la escuela puede verse diferente con medidas de seguridad y distanciamiento social integradas en la decisiones. Dijo que aunque espera y tiene la expectacin que los estudiantes regresen a la escuela este otoo, los distritos deben estar preparados para cambiar a aprendizaje remoto si es necesario. Si esto ocurriera, el aprendizaje remoto en Weld RE-4 continuar evolucionando y se ver diferente de lo que fue esta primavera, priorizando el nuevo aprendizaje y la responsabilidad adicional.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: Tenga en cuenta que continuar el aprendizaje remoto es una prioridad para los estudiantes hasta el ltimo da del ao escolar 2019-20 (21 de mayo). A principios de mayo, cada escuela comunicar un plan para que los estudiantes regresen al edificio para recuperar artculos personales. Los procedimientos de recogida estn alineados con los protocolos de distanciamiento social y sern revisados con el Departamento de Salud Pblica y Medio Ambiente del Condado de Weld.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: En las ltimas semanas de clases, puede esperar que nuestras escuelas continan refinando y mejorando sus planes de aprendizaje remoto para apoyar el xito emocional y acadmico de los estudiantes. Esto incluye a los alumnos de ltimo ao de la escuela secundaria que se gradan de Windsor mientras hacen la transicin a sus prximos pasos en la vida. El gobernador inform a los superintendentes que las ceremonias tradicionales de graduacin probablemente no sern posibles hasta fines del otoo. Encontraremos formas de celebrar esta importante ocasin en la vida de nuestros estudiantes. Adems, el distrito continuar proporcionando comidas y dispositivos tecnolgicos y apoyo al menos hasta el ltimo da de clases. Se proporcionar ms orientacin sobre las actividades tradicionales de verano.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: No es as como imaginamos terminar el ao escolar. Como muchos de ustedes, nos sentimos decepcionados y entristecidos. Sin embargo, eclipsar esos sentimientos es una increble sensacin de esperanza y fe. Aunque estamos fsicamente distanciados, creo que nuestro sentido de comunidad nunca ha sido ms fuerte. Bajo circunstancias sin precedentes, nuestros maestros estn encontrando nuevas formas de conectarse y apoyar a nuestros estudiantes y entre ellos. Nuestra comunidad y nuestro distrito escolar nunca sern los mismos ... esperamos que sea mejor.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

p.span: Esperamos dar la bienvenida a nuestros estudiantes, familias y personal de regreso a la escuela. Mantnganse saludables y seguros.

span.style: font-size: 11pt; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif;

div.div: 1020 Main Street, Windsor, CO 80550 | Phone 970-686-8000 | Fax 970-686-8001
